meanings.definition: Below the best or most favorable level.
meanings.sent1: The suboptimal weather made our picnic less enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: Her suboptimal performance in the race was still impressive.
meanings.sent3: It was suboptimal timing for the rain to start just as we set up the tent.
meanings.sent4: The suboptimal lighting in the room cast eerie shadows on the walls.
meanings.sent5: The suboptimal quality of the ingredients was evident in the bland taste of the dish.

meanings.sent1: The suboptimal solution did not fully address the problem.
meanings.sent2: His suboptimal score on the test was a result of not studying enough.
meanings.sent3: Wearing mismatched socks was a suboptimal fashion choice for the event.
meanings.sent4: The suboptimal road conditions made the journey more challenging.
meanings.sent5: The suboptimal fit of the dress was noticeable as she walked down the runway.
